title: What does Rammus say when he taunts?
body:
What does the Armordillio say when he taunts a champion? Give an example for a specific champion below!

Example:
{{champion:113}} Oh look, a fat pig. Riding a boar.
{{champion:24}} Real weapon wouldn't help.

replies.body:
They're not all gonna be winners...

{{champion:103}} "I'm gonna make a coat out of those tails."
{{champion:268}} "Shurima.  Don't blow it up this time."
{{champion:432}} "Ima send you on a magical journey right back to the fountain."
{{champion:201}} "I eat poros for breakfast."
{{champion:122}} "Yi's the real Dunkmaster."
{{champion:119}} "Draaaaaaaaven.  Sucks."
{{champion:60}} "I swat bigger spiders than you in my bathroom."
{{champion:114}} "I'm gonna use that thing to pick my teeth."
{{champion:150}} "Ooga booga."
{{champion:120}} "Oh god, it's a brony."
{{champion:126}} "Viktor's better."
{{champion:222}} "Are you shooting me, or is it just raining?"
{{champion:429}} "Spirit of Vengeance.  Specialty, running away."
{{champion:121}} "Try evolving some skill."
{{champion:127}} "One goal.  Thousands of years.  No success."
{{champion:236}} "Ever considered remarrying?"
{{champion:117}} "Yep, that tasted fail."
{{champion:267}} "Nice air bladders."
{{champion:111}} "Where's your Little Sister?"
{{champion:133}} "Have you ever been good?"
{{champion:421}} "I'll give you some tremors to sense."
{{champion:107}} "You can't haz cheezburger."
{{champion:72}} "I like your lore rewrite."
{{champion:134}} "You're the worst juggler I've ever seen."
{{champion:412}} "Hook me.  I dare you."
{{champion:110}} "Dude looks like a lady."
{{champion:254}} "This is one vault you can't break."
{{champion:112}} "Jayce is better."
{{champion:101}} "What kind've mage only knows four spells?"
{{champion:157}} "Riven did it."
{{champion:154}} "The graphics team really ran out of ideas when they made you."
{{champion:238}} "Shen said you can't fight a real enemy.  Guess he was right."
{{champion:115}} "You can't even blow up a paper bag."
{{champion:143}} "Time to pull some weeds."

> {{champion:122}} "Yi's the real Dunkmaster."
> {{champion:121}} "Try evolving some skill."
> {{champion:127}} "One goal.  Thousands of years.  No success."
No jabs at viktor soviet Russia jokes? Or a joke about azir and my shurima (my sharona)

*{{champion:33}}  walks up to {{champion:37}} *

{{champion:33}}: ...

{{champion:37}}: ...

{{champion:33}}: ...

{{champion:37}}: ...

{{champion:33}}: ...

{{champion:37}}: ...

{{champion:33}}: ...

{{champion:37}}: ...

{{champion:33}}: ...ok

{{champion:37}}: IT'S ON, BITCH!!!!!!!

Guess this is it.
Can't get any better.
I spent 20 minutes laughing at this and sounded like a dying hyena
I hereby proclaim you the winner of a rammus-off.

{{champion:266}} Ok.
{{champion:103}} Yeah.
{{champion:84}} Alright.
{{champion:12}} Ok.
{{champion:32}} Yeah.
{{champion:34}} Alright.
{{champion:1}} Ok.
{{champion:22}} Yeah.
{{champion:268}} Alright.

{{champion:33}} "You call that penetration?"

{{champion:44}} "Why you outrageous little, I'm gonna crush you with this hamm—"

{{champion:33}} "Ok"
'You are nothing more than ass, waiting, to be smashed.'
This is the greatest video ever made.

{{champion:33}}  You're a glorified flashlight
{{champion:63}} ...
{{champion:33}} OOH! apply water to burned area

{{champion:77}} "Awww, did someone kill your sissy little master? Whaaa! Pee Sin felt sorry for your useless ass!"
{{champion:72}} "Wittle scorpio misses his wee wittle fake spiders? Well Rito had fun with their bums." Retcon
Nice. Kinda want a thread for what Ahri says when she charms, now.
